noun.description: An endearingly sweet or pretty child or young girl (often used as an affectionate form of address)
examples: “Here you are, poppet,” the nurse said

noun.description: A small figure of a human being used in sorcery and witchcraft.
A mushroom-shaped valve with a flat end piece that is lifted in and out of an opening by an axial rod.

origin: Late Middle English: based on Latin pup(p)a girl, doll. Compare with puppet.
